typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Grant already exists, must revoke first."

arguments.value: Grant already exists, must revoke first.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Grant already exists, must revoke first."

documentation.text: @notice Allows a grant recipient to claim their vested tokens. Errors if no tokens have vested

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Grant already exists, must revoke first."

attributes.type: literal_string "Grant already exists, must revoke first."
attributes.value: Grant already exists, must revoke first.

attributes.text: @notice Allows a grant recipient to claim their vested tokens. Errors if no tokens have vested

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._recipient: address of the token grant recipient

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

calculateGrantClaim(address).notice: Calculate the vested and unclaimed months and tokens available for `_grantId` to claim Due to rounding errors once grant duration is reached, returns the entire left grant amount Returns (0, 0) if cliff has not been reached

claimVestedTokens().notice: Allows a grant recipient to claim their vested tokens. Errors if no tokens have vested

revokeTokenGrant(address).notice: Terminate token grant transferring all vested tokens to the `_recipient` and returning all non-vested tokens to the contract owner Secured to the contract owner only
